Headline: #90 Harlem Temporary Reroute at Harlem/Byron
ShortDescription: 90 Harlem buses are temporarily rerouted via Halem, Addison, Oak Park, Irving Park, and Harlem due to, street blockage near Harlem/Byron.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#90 Harlem buses are temporarily rerouted via Halem, Addison, Oak Park, Irving Park, and Harlem due to, street blockage near Harlem/Byron.
